properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from South Santee River to Edisto Beach SC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 19 at 3:16PM EST until February 21 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Charleston SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 40 kt and seas 5 to 8 ft expected. For the Small Craft
Advisory, northeast winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 3 to 6 ft.

* WHERE...South Santee River to Edisto Beach out 20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 PM Thursday to 4 PM EST
Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THURSDAY... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THURSDAY TO 4 PM EST FRIDAY
